sect1.para: ISO images are available for free under and other mirrors.
The following lists some of the many ways to obtain NetBSD on CD-ROM. If you offer one and would like it to be listed here, contact us.
The latest official release is NetBSD &release.latest;.

sect3.title: 5.0.2 - Linux System Labs
sect3.para: Linux System Labs offers the NetBSD 5.0.2 release for i386 and amd64. They're located in Australia, but will gladly ship worldwide.

sect3.title: 4.0.1 - Linux Central
sect3.para: Linux Central ships a 3 CD NetBSD 4.0.1 set.

sect3.title: 5.0.2 - CheepLinux
sect3.para: CheepLinux offers NetBSD 5.0.2 on CD. Orders dispatch before 3:30PM on the same day and ship worldwide.

sect3.title: 5.0.2 - Linux-Distro.co.uk
sect3.para: Linux Distro UK is selling NetBSD 5.0.2 for amd64, i386, and macppc platforms. The company is based in the UK but does offer cheap shipping to the rest of the world.

sect3.title: 4.0, 3,1 - Mensys BV
sect3.para: Mensys sells NetBSD 4.0/i386 and 3.1/i386 on CD-ROM.

sect3.title: 3.1 - Maxtux.co.uk
sect3.para: maxtux.co.uk sells an i386 installation CD of NetBSD 3.1, and an accompanying binary package set.

sect3.title: 5.0 - linuxcenter.ru
sect3.para: LinuxCenter is selling NetBSD 5.0. Company located in Russia.

sect3.title: Custom - Yong S. Yi: Release versions for all architectures
sect3.para: Yong S. Yi ysyi@async.org also produces custom CDs, including the release, binary packages, and documentation, for whatever architecture (or combination of architectures) is requested. Price is US $6.50, including shipping to any U.S. location.

sect3.title: Canada and USA - 5.0.2 - OS Dics by Mail (all ports)
sect3.para: OS Discs By Mail provides a "Download-Burn-Mail" service. They will download and burn any free operating system discs.

sect3.title: Canada - 5.0 - CheapBytes
sect3.para: CheapBytes offers NetBSD 5.0 install CDs for i386 and amd64, containing the release binaries and source code.

sect3.title: France - 5.0.1 - getlinux
sect3.para: Getlinux offers NetBSD 5.0.1.

sect3.title: Germany - 5.0 Linux2go
sect3.para: German-based Linux2go offers NetBSD 5.0 (i386, amd64) and ships within Germany.

sect3.title: Germany/Europe - 4.0 Lehmanns Bookshop
sect3.para: German-based (and Europe-wide shipping) bookshop Lehmanns offers a NetBSD 4.0 4-CD-set.

sect3.title: Germany and EU - 4.0.1 - bsdiso - Software Service Ronald Brock
sect3.para: http://www.bsdiso.de/ offers 4.0.1 CDs for NetBSD/i386 as well as other platforms, shipping within the European Union from Germany.

sect3.title: Germany - 5.0 - ixsoft Softwareentwicklung
sect3.para: ixsoft Softwareentwicklung offers 5.0 DVDs for amd64 and i386. See their site for more details.

sect3.title: India - 4.0 - LinuxBazar
sect3.para: offers a NetBSD/i386 4.0. They also ship to Bangladesh, Bhutan, Nepal, Pakistan and Sri Lanka.

sect3.title: Kazakhstan - 4.0 - linuxcenter.kz
sect3.para: LinuxCenter.KZ offers NetBSD 3.x and 4.x in the Republic of Kazakhstan.

sect3.title: Poland - 3.1 - e-systems
sect3.para: E-systems offers the latest stable version 3.1 of NetBSD/i386 on CD-ROM.

sect3.title: Russia - 4.0.1 - OpenByte
sect3.para: OpenByte.ru offers NetBSD 5.0.2 in Russian Federation.

sect3.title: Spain - 4.0.1 - Compralinux.com
sect3.para: Compralinux.com offers NetBSD 4.0.1 and older version multi-architecture and i386 specific CD-ROMs within Spain.

sect3.title: USA - 5.0 - CheapBytes
sect3.para: See CheapBytes.

sect3.title: Ukraine - 5.0.2 - Lafox.Net (amd64, i386)
sect3.para: Lafox.Net offers NetBSD 5.0.2 for i386 and amd64.

sect3.title: Official NetBSD ISO images
sect3.para: The list of NetBSD ISO download sites provides a list of sites worldwide where these official ISO images can be downloaded.
The iso directory on each mirror contains one image per port, and they are bootable on platforms that support booting from CD/DVD.
